item.title: Hacky Easter 2015
item.description: Another year, another Hacky Easter and a month, of fun, learning, and frustrations. All in all this was another great year and I’m already looking forward to 2016’s edition. I found this year’s challenges were a bit harder than last year, but I did my best. Challenge 01 I’m told to search out the password in the following image Taking note of the missing letters and rearranging them to spell HACKERZ I’ll enter that into the egg-o-matic and see what happens.
